did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Libros de bautismos, entierros y casamientos de Santo Thomás y de San Miguel, desde 1 de Enero de 1727 1727
did.abstract: Photographs of pages from original holograph parish register from Santo Tomás de Villanueva de Tojorare and its visita of San Miguel, January 1, 1727 to September 10, 1767.

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Libros de bautismos, entierros y casamientos de Santo Thomás y de San Miguel, desde 1 de Enero de 1727 (MS 176). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul Roca, 1980.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The missions were part of the Tarahumara Alta chain founded by Tomás de Guadalajara.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photographs of pages from original holograph parish register from Santo Tomás de Villanueva de Tojorare and its visita of San Miguel, January 1, 1727 to September 10, 1767.
Photographed by P. D. Urbano. Cuidad Guerrero, Chihuahua : Archives of La Purísima Concepción de Papigóchic, October 1971.
